bullets: Accelerated contributions to a new visual editor product, exceeding sprint goals with an average cycle time of 2 days, participating in daily stand-ups, code reviews via Gerrit, and tracking progress in 2-week sprints using JIRA.

Revamped API routing to support 16+ new routes and the future migration of 84 additional routes by creating a new sub-router in Go to register HTTP handlers and pass in gRPC connections to server-side code in a distributed system.

Enhanced a legacy React component by adding a new data filtering property, requiring modifications to server-side Java code and client-side support, updating 53 usages across the monorepo and deploying with no breaking changes.

Mentored and served as project manager for 3 groups of 5 students in the Software Engineering course, providing guidance on developing a full-stack web application with Django, Heroku, PostgreSQL, and AWS S3.

Coached students to achieve above-average project grades and a 95.2% deadline success rate by adhering to the Agile Scrum methodology, leading sprint planning, and delivering constructive feedback on project guidelines.

Educated over 400 students in the Software Development Essentials course on topics such as MVC design and test-driven development by providing individual instruction during office hours and in online discussion forums.

Developed, tested, and integrated several new scalable features into production in a distributed cloud infrastructure by making daily deployments to Amazon Web Services (Lambda, S3) leveraging Serverless Framework.
Reduced frontend page load time by 57% by modularizing and organizing existing JavaScript files and implementing an optimized algorithm for rendering dynamic content into a table with pagination.
Accelerated MySQL insert efficiency from exponential time to constant time by designing and executing a query optimization algorithm that resulted in a significant reduction in insert statements.

Processed COVID-19 mobility data from 1.8 million U.S. locations for a project funded by the National Science Foundation by employing custom Python and PostgreSQL scripts to manage large and diverse file formats.

Led a presentation to over 120 faculty and interns at the UVA Biocomplexity Institute's annual research symposium by collaborating with a mentor to research and create a final poster of all research findings.
